select res_id resId,user_id userId, title,type, knowledge_id knowledgeId, thumb_up thumbUp,thumb_down thumbDown,state from res_info where res_id = #{resId};

select ri.user_id, ui.nick_name, si.name from res_info ri left join user_info ui on ri.user_id = ui.user_id left join school_info si on si.school_id = ui.school_id where ri.res_id = #{resId}
select rd.content, rd.type from res_info ri left join res_data rd on rd.data_id in (select rdcon.data_id from res_data_con rdcon where rdcon.res_id = ri.res_id) where ri.res_id = #{resId}
